snippet: Prime Minister Baburam Bhattarai will dissolve his cabinet and form a new coalition government that includes members of the main opposition parties, an aide said Thursday.
abstract: Prime Min Baburam Bhattarai of Nepal, in a last-ditch effort to finish years of work on the country's new constitution, will dissolve his cabinet and form a new coalition government that includes members of the main opposition parties.
lead_paragraph: Prime Minister Baburam Bhattarai will dissolve his cabinet and form a new coalition government that includes members of the main opposition parties, an aide said Thursday.

headline.seo: Nepal: Baburam Bhattarai Plans New Government
